segments.text: Aren ’ t you interested in watching the Olympics ? There have been some excellent performances by athletes from all over the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just don ’ t find it very interesting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it ’ s wonderful to see people from all over the world taking part in such a great event .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that for a lot of people , it ’ s just a way to try and show their country is better than other countries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think the Olympics help to promote world peace .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m not sure about that . We still have many wars in the world . I think that the idea behind the Olympics is a good one , but the reality is that during the Olympics countries compete . There ’ s no real spirit of cooperation and people are usually not very friendly to each other .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are so pessimistic ! The Olympics is a great opportunity for athletes to demonstrate their speed , skill , agility and strength . Most people hope to see someone from their country win , but I think that they are just happy to see good performances by any athlete .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I think that the most amazing performances are by athletes who participate in the Paralympics .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now there we are in agreement !
segments.speaker: S1
